synopsis.text:
Ghosts, a nefarious organization, subjects nine unsuspecting individuals to a cruel transformation, turning them into cyborgs to serve their malevolent purposes. Among these unwilling subjects is Joe Shimamura, now known as Cyborg 009. Instead of succumbing to their fate, the cyborgs, under the guidance of the benevolent Dr. Gilmore, make a daring escape.

Each cyborg is endowed with a unique ability, ranging from the power to liquefy any substance to the capacity for underwater respiration and flight. Rather than employing these extraordinary abilities for the sinister intentions of their former captors, they unite as a formidable force against evil.

As a team, they stand against the Neo-Black Ghosts and any other malevolent entities that threaten peace and justice. Their mission is clear: to protect the world from the very evil that sought to control them. This is the thrilling saga of Cyborg 009 and his fellow cyborgs, a testament to their unwavering resolve in the face of adversity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
